data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There's a lot I will assume about a person based on his or her physical appearance. First of all, I can usually tell a person's personality from that person's appearance, from how trustworthy the person is as to whether the person is an extrovert. For example, a person's facial structure can give me clues about how aggressive he or she is. On the other hand, I tend to assume that good-looking people possess other positive qualities aside from their looks, such as intelligence and commitment. What's more, a person's appearance can also reveal things about his or her health, such as the likelihood of developing certain diseases. (106字)
data.referenceText: What does someone's appearance tell you about them?
data.referenceTranslate: 一个人的外表会告诉你他的什么?
